Articles.Content: Year 912: The Klenderman blood is analysed and it shares kerbal DNA. There is panic in Kurope and most of the world. Sightings of Klenderman are reported everywhere and the authorities are contacted by the 'Dark Avengers'.
Year 928: Klenderman is captured by a group of khristians, and handed over to the Kerbal millitary for interogation.
Year 933: after 5 years of interrogation, Klenderman has revealed that he came to the Kerbol system via a crashed saucer on Mun after chasing the space kraken for 60 years
Year 934: A special prison cell is made for Klenderman, he will stay their all his life. The kerbals go back to focus on landing on another planet

Year 935: colonies are reestablished on the Mun and the crashed saucer is found and experimented on. saucer is discovered to powered by element 115 (see what did there) and research is being done on the creation of a Alcubierre drive.

Year 980: After 45 years of reasearch, budget gaining, and a Klenderman truce, the Alcibierre drive is created, and the first Starship is created.

The Starship travels to a planet called "Earth", and to the inhabitants of Earth, the starship's crash is known as the "Roswell Incident"

Year 981: It becomes apparent to every Kerbal not directly involved in researching the Alcubierre drive that it sure would be nice if the Kerbal civilization were able to do more than one thing at a time. 45 years of twiddling their thumbs, they found, was very boring. Much controversy ensues.
990: Kerbals travel to Laythe, only to found that there is ALMOST no life. There are microbes in the weater!

991: 63 years after his capture, Klenderman escapes. At the same time, approximately Ã¢â€“Ë†.Ã¢â€“Ë†% of Kerbals contract temporary insanity. The resulting damage to Kerbal science causes almost all knowledge of Alcubierre drives to be lost. Klenderman was not found.
Year 995 - Kerbal kibble is invented, five months later, it is shown to cause hyperactivity in kerbals.
Year 1000: Kerbals invent the Kerbol Mk1 rocket. The astronauts aren't found, because he wasn't very bright.
Year 1000: World-wide millennium celebrations! Oh SRB Oh SRB, how beautiful thy flame is!
Year 1003: Kerbals start the building of the Kerbal International Space Station.

Year 1004: but fail the first time as they used the wrong kind of docking ports.

They try again this year. Main Hab module complete!
1004: Due to Jebidiah forgetting to extend the panels the station runs out of power.
1004,0000001: So Jeb goes out to kick that panel, and fold it out manually. The station works! Oh wait... **** it's on sub-orbital trajetory.

1004,0000002: Jeb manages to use a booster still attached to the station to save it. Old Files on the Alcubierre drive are found and promptly put into storage. The Kerbals get tired of using capsules, and start to think of using more reusable craft: so begins the research, development, and use of the Kerbal Orbital Shuttle. It is an outstanding success.

Year 1005: Space station Fractured and the Kerbal International space station dock together in the first station docking. The space station is now 4KM long and 2KM wide housing nearly twice as many Kerbals as space station Fractured did alone.
1005.02: Scientists are now able to calculate wobbleness by using a billion RCS thrusters on the station to turn it.

Year 1006: After some research in to wobbleness, the Kerbal Scientists perfect the Infi-Glider. The public is against the idea of exploiting so called 'Physic Glitches' to advanced the society. There are violent protests in Kermany and Koland.
Year 1009: Komputer Games are invented, and incorperated into the KISS, and almost all other spacecraft.
Year 1011: [CURRENT DATE] Modern Jeb, Bill, and Bob come together as astronauts.

Year 1012: the begging of an initiative for a Duna mission is started. The plan is to use stages from their Mun rockets as well as some older space station tech to cobble together a Duna vessel. Construction begins in earnest, since the next window is in 2 years.
1013: That was unbelievable! A huge meteorite hitted Duna! It was so huge, that Duna's orbit is now longer! For now next launch windows in 3 months. That' not enough time.
1014: The Duna orbit change incident was found to be a combination of a hoax and mechanical problems with a telescope. Construction is completed, and the ship begins its two year voyage to Duna.
